props.label: Display value on progress bar if true. Label can be customized via label slot
props.precision: Number of digits after dot in progress value, minimum = 0, maximum = 100
props.indeterminate: Renders indeterminate progress bar. Note: value, max, label, precision and transition props are ignored if indeterminate is true. You can switch between indeterminate or determinate by flicking this prop on and off
props.transition: Add smooth animation when value change
